progression_balancing.description:
A system that can move progression earlier, to try and prevent the player from getting stuck and bored early.
A lower setting means more getting stuck. A higher setting means less getting stuck.

accessibility.description:
Set rules for reachability of your items/locations.
Locations: ensure everything can be reached and acquired.
Items: ensure all logically relevant items can be acquired.
Minimal: ensure what is needed to reach your goal can be acquired.

priority_locations.description: Prevent these locations from having an unimportant item

allow_just_as_planned_dlc_songs.displayName: Allow Just As Planned DLC Songs
allow_just_as_planned_dlc_songs.description:
Whether or not Just as Planned DLC songs, and all the DLCs along with it, will be included in the randomiser.
Note: The newest DLC songs will most likely not be included in any randomisation.

streamer_mode_enabled.description: Whether or not the randomisation will take into account Streamer Mode. If enabled, only songs available in Streamer Mode will be randomised.

starting_song_count.description: The number of songs that will be automatically unlocked at the start of a run.

additional_song_count.description:
The total number of songs that will be placed in the randomisation pool.
- Does not count any starting songs or the final goal.
- Final count may be lower due to other settings.

additional_item_percentage.description:
What percentage of songs will have 2 items instead of 1. Starting Songs are always first in line to have extra locations.
If there are not enough locations to place Music Sheets, extra locations will be added.

song_difficulty_mode.description:
Filters songs based:
- Easy: At least 1 difficulty between 1-5
- Medium: At least 1 difficulty between 5-8
- Hard: At least 1 difficulty between 8+
- Any: All songs are available

grade_needed.description:
Requires a grade of this or higher in order to get items.
Grades are as follows:
Silver S (SS): >= 95% accuracy
Pink S (S): >= 90% accuracy
A: >= 80% or a Full Combo
B: >= 70%
C: >= 60%

music_sheet_count.description: The amount of Music Sheets spread around this seed. Music Sheets are required to unlock the final song.

music_sheet_win_count.description: The number of Music Sheets needed to unlock the winning song.

death_link.description: When you die, everyone dies. Of course the reverse is true too.
